title: Mallboy and sound design
brief_description: Speakers: Philip Brophy (Sound Designer) Vincent Girusso (Director/Writer) Fiona Eagger (Producer) discussing the decisions they made for the sound design of ‘Mallboy’. This was a presentation for Cinesonic conference 2000 filmed for research purposes only.
